title: Daily Dedication
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Nico Nico Nii~♪ Nico will be taking your heart Nico~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Something like that, I guess. How was it, Mari?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Perfect! As expected of Nikocchi, absolutely perfect as a school idol~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Heh, obviously! Nico is the number one school idol in the universe, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari kind of wants to have a great line like you too, Nikocchi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Let’s see, you should do some research. Well, it’ll take some time to get as good as me, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hmm.... how about something like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari Mari・Mari~♪ Locking on to your heart♪ Be mine and only mine♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Just kidding~! How was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Grrr.... Cute.... or so I thought, but it’s not complete yet, Mari! Nico will give you special training!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
